<summary>What's your diagnosis</summary>

</details>


<details close>

<summary>Notes</summary>
<br>


**Definion:** Idiopathic form of PPFE considered a form of idiopathic interstitial pneumonia <br>
<br>
**Epidemiology and Localization:** <br> Wide age range (20-80)<br> Males and Females equally affected <br> Upper lobes predominantly affected
<br><br>
**Microscopy:** <br> Subpleural dense fibroelastosis.
<br><br>
**Therapy and Prognosis:** <br> Diverse outcome of idiopathic form, some progress rapidly and require transplantation, others show slow progression over decades. <br>  
**References:** <br>https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/31425665/ <br> https://journals.sagepub.com/doi/10.1177/1479973119867945?icid=int.sj-abstract.similar-articles.2 <br> https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC6685112/
